name: NSDiffableDataSourceSnapshotReference
desc: The Swift representation of the Objective-C object you use to represent the state of the data in a view at a specific point in time.

items.name: func appendSections(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Adds the sections with the specified identifiers to the snapshot.

items.name: func appendItems(withIdentifiers: [Any], intoSectionWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the specified section of the snapshot.

items.name: func appendItems(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the last section of the snapshot.

items.name: var numberOfItems: Int
items.desc: The number of items in the snapshot.

items.name: var numberOfSections: Int
items.desc: The number of sections in the snapshot.

items.name: func numberOfItems(inSection: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items in the specified section of the snapshot.

items.name: var itemIdentifiers: [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of all of the items in the snapshot.

items.name: var sectionIdentifiers: [Any]
items.desc: The identifiers of all of the sections in the snapshot.

items.name: func index(ofItemIdentifier: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the item in the snapshot with the specified identifier.

items.name: func index(ofSectionIdentifier: Any) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the section of the snapshot with the specified identifier.

items.name: func itemIdentifiersInSection(withIdentifier: Any) -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns the identifiers of all of the items in the specified section of the snapshot.

items.name: func sectionIdentifier(forSectionContainingItemIdentifier: Any) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the identifier of the section containing the specified item in the snapshot.

items.name: func insertItems(withIdentifiers: [Any], afterItemWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided items immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the snapshot.

items.name: func insertItems(withIdentifiers: [Any], beforeItemWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided items immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the snapshot.

items.name: func insertSections(withIdentifiers: [Any], afterSectionWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided sections immediately after the section with the specified identifier in the snapshot.

items.name: func insertSections(withIdentifiers: [Any], beforeSectionWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Inserts the provided sections immediately before the section with the specified identifier in the snapshot.

items.name: func deleteAllItems()
items.desc: Deletes all of the items from the snapshot.

items.name: func deleteItems(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.

items.name: func deleteSections(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Deletes the sections with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.

items.name: func moveItem(withIdentifier: Any, afterItemWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Moves the item from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately after the specified item.

items.name: func moveItem(withIdentifier: Any, beforeItemWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Moves the item from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately before the specified item.

items.name: func moveSection(withIdentifier: Any, afterSectionWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Moves the section from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately after the specified section.

items.name: func moveSection(withIdentifier: Any, beforeSectionWithIdentifier: Any)
items.desc: Moves the section from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately before the specified section.

items.name: func reconfigureItems(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Updates the data for the items you specify in the snapshot, preserving the existing cells for the items.

items.name: var reconfiguredItemIdentifiers: [Any]
items.desc: Identifies the items reconfigured by the changes to the snapshot.

items.name: func reloadItems(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Reloads the data within the specified items in the snapshot.

items.name: var reloadedItemIdentifiers: [Any]
items.desc: Identifies the items reloaded by the changes to the snapshot.

items.name: func reloadSections(withIdentifiers: [Any])
items.desc: Reloads the data within the specified sections of the snapshot.

items.name: var reloadedSectionIdentifiers: [Any]
items.desc: Identifies the sections reloaded by the changes to the snapshot.
